1.name: The Fifth Element
1.description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

2.name: Titanic
2.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

3.name: Event Horizon
3.description: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

4.name: Good Will Hunting
4.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

5.name: Cube
5.description: 6 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

6.name: Starship Troopers
6.description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs in a satire of modern world politics.

7.name: Men in Black
7.description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

8.name: L.A. Confidential
8.description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen -- one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy -- investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

9.name: Hercules
9.description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

10.name: Life Is Beautiful
10.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

11.name: Boogie Nights
11.description: The story of a young man's adventures in the California pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

12.name: Batman & Robin
12.description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

13.name: Gummo
13.description: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

14.name: Jackie Brown
14.description: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

15.name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
15.description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

16.name: Lolita
16.description: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

17.name: Home Alone 3
17.description: Alex Pruitt, a young boy of nine living in Chicago, fends off thieves who seek a top-secret chip in his toy car to support a North Korean terrorist organization's next deed.

18.name: Dante's Peak
18.description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

19.name: The Devil's Advocate
19.description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

20.name: As Good as It Gets
20.description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

21.name: The Game
21.description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

22.name: Alien: Resurrection
22.description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

23.name: Liar Liar
23.description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

24.name: Gattaca
24.description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

25.name: Anaconda
25.description: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

26.name: Lost Highway
26.description: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

27.name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
27.description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

28.name: Princess Mononoke
28.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

29.name: Contact
29.description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

30.name: Con Air
30.description: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

31.name: Face/Off
31.description: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

32.name: George of the Jungle
32.description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

33.name: Anastasia
33.description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

34.name: Orgazmo
34.description: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

35.name: Scream 2
35.description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

36.name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
36.description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

37.name: Vegas Vacation
37.description: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

38.name: Tomorrow Never Dies
38.description: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

39.name: The Jackal
39.description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

40.name: Spawn
40.description: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

41.name: Selena
41.description: The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

42.name: My Best Friend's Wedding
42.description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

43.name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
43.description: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

44.name: Donnie Brasco
44.description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

45.name: G.I. Jane
45.description: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

46.name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
46.description: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

47.name: The Postman
47.description: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

48.name: Perfect Blue
48.description: A retired pop singer turned actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.

49.name: The Edge
49.description: An intellectual billionaire and two lesser men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

50.name: Chasing Amy
50.description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.
